definition: To adhere or stick two things together, often using a substance or adhesive. It is commonly used to describe the action of joining surfaces or materials, creating a bond that is difficult to separate.

examples.german: Ich klebe das Poster an die Wand.
examples.english: I stick the poster to the wall.

examples.german: Die Etiketten kleben gut auf den Flaschen.
examples.english: The labels stick well on the bottles.

examples.german: Vorsicht, der Kleber klebt sehr schnell.
examples.english: Be careful, the glue sticks very quickly.
